New Records: Messi scored his 107th and 108th international goals, moving him joint-second with Ali Daei on the list of top men’s international scorers
Key Match Events: Argentina conceded an early own goal in the 4th minute, but Messi equalized 8 minutes later. Lautaro Martinez scored a penalty in the 39th minute, and Messi assisted Martinez for Argentina’s third goal in the 66th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was playing their final international friendly before Copa America
Post-Match Reflections: Messi's strong performance was highlighted, and Lautaro Martinez's penalty conversion was noted
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Commanders Field in Maryland, and the crowd was 51,713 strong
Others: Chelsea midfielder Enzo Fernandez made his first start after recovering from hernia surgery, and Nicolas Otamendi started in place of Cristian Romero at center back
